title: How Many Calories in a PBJ Sandwich?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in a pbj sandwich, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a PBJ Sandwich?
assumptions: Standard PBJ: 2 slices white bread, 2 tbsp creamy peanut butter, 1 tbsp grape jelly; no added butter or crust removal.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, peanut butter brand, jelly sweetness, portion sizes, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard PBJ sandwich has about 380 kcal, with high carbs from bread and jelly plus protein and fat from peanut butter.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat bread instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories is in a pbj sandwich?
faqs.a: Approximately 380 kcal for a standard version with 2 slices white bread, 2 tbsp PB, and 1 tbsp jelly.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a PBJ sandwich?
faqs.a: About 13 g, mostly from the peanut butter.

faqs.q: Are PBJ sandwiches high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, around 18 g total sugars, mainly from jelly and bread.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in a PBJ sandwich?
faqs.a: Use less peanut butter, opt for low-sugar jelly, or choose whole grain bread to cut ~20-100 kcal.

faqs.q: Does bread type affect PBJ calories?
faqs.a: White bread adds more carbs; whole wheat is similar in calories but higher in fiber.
